import {NavLink} from 'react-router-dom' import './navbar-styling.css' import {useRecoilState} from 'recoil' import ItemInCart from './ItemInCart' function Navbar(props){ const [currentCart,setCart]=useRecoilState(props.atom) return (
Home Product
{Object.keys(currentCart).map((id)=> )}
) } export default Navbar;
